    public class GlobalCoupledModel
extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.CoupledModel
    The class GlobalCoupledModel defines a simple coupled model for the household management simulator.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       URI != null && !URI.isEmpty()

    Created on : 2023-10-02

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:

      • GlobalCoupledModel

        public GlobalCoupledModel(java.lang.String uri,
                          java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit simulatedTimeUnit,
                          fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.interfaces.CoordinatorI simulationEngine,
                          fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.ModelI[] submodels,
                          java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventI>,fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventSink[]> imported,
                          java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventI>,fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.ReexportedEvent> reexported,
                          java.util.Map<fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventSource,fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventSink[]> connections,
                          java.util.Map<fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.StaticVariableDescriptor,fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.VariableSink[]> importedVars,
                          java.util.Map<fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.VariableSource,fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.StaticVariableDescriptor> reexportedVars,
                          java.util.Map<fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.VariableSource,fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.VariableSink[]> bindings)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        creating the coupled model.

        Contract

         pre     uri == null || !uri.isEmpty()
 pre     simulatedTimeUnit != null
 pre     simulationEngine != null && !simulationEngine.isModelSet()
 pre     simulationEngine instanceof CoordinationEngine
 pre     submodels != null && submodels.length > 1
 pre     Stream.of(submodels).allMatch(s -> s != null)
 pre     imported != null
 pre     reexported != null
 pre     connections != null
 pre     importedVars != null
 pre     reexportedVars != null
 pre     bindings != null
 post    !isDebugModeOn()
 post    getURI() != null && !getURI().isEmpty()
 post    uri == null || getURI().equals(uri)
 post    getSimulatedTimeUnit().equals(simulatedTimeUnit)
 post    getSimulationEngine().equals(simulationEngine)
        Parameters:
        uri - URI of the coupled model to be created.
        simulatedTimeUnit - time unit used in the simulation by the model.
        simulationEngine - simulation engine enacting the model.
        submodels - array of submodels of the new coupled model.
        imported - map from imported event types to submodels consuming them.
        reexported - map from event types exported by submodels that are reexported by this coupled model.
        connections - map connecting event sources to arrays of event sinks among submodels.
        importedVars - variables imported by the coupled model that are consumed by submodels.
        reexportedVars - variables exported by submodels that are reexported by the coupled model.
        bindings - bindings between exported and imported variables among submodels.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

    • Method Detail

      • select

        public java.lang.String select(java.lang.String[] candidates)
        when more than one model has an internal transition to perform at some simulated time, select the one that will execute.

        Description

        In the solar panel simulator, the power output by the solar panel is computed from the sun intensity, hence to get the most precise value, the sun intensity model must execute first and then the solar panel power model.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no more preconditions.
 post    true        // no more postconditions.
        Overrides:
        select in class fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.CoupledModel
        See Also:
        CoupledModel.select(java.lang.String[])
